data.name: Orcs and Outlaws
data.detailed_description:
A new generation of Orc warriors
Their army of dragons, demons and the undead
A bionic blonde bounty hunter
And guns…… lots and lots of guns!

Really, you want more

BACKGROUND

They always exited. Before human time could be measured, Orcs thrived in the darkness. Led astray by the Dark Lords in the genesis wars, they survived the centuries by becoming independent and almost unseeable to man.

Aware of the their growing ethereal abilities, the kingdoms of man declared Orcs and their rogue spirts as outlaws and issued a king’s ransom for their capture, dead or alive. Unknown to most and operating in the shadows, the world’s most dangerous profession was established - demonic bounty hunting.

Former mixed martial artist, Mia Zukov is the baddest Orc hunter in the business. Cybernetically enhanced and deadly accurate, she has taken down some of the biggest Orc scores ever.

A new Orc tribe has emerged. Highly organized and protected by their army of the possessed and undead, they have found refuge in Bikini Atoll, the abandoned nuclear test site in the Pacific ocean. They need to be stopped. Dangerous but lucrative work!



Key Features:

THIRD PERSON ACTION ADVENTURE
You must use a combination of stealth, speed, and stamina to explore each Orc island. Mixing classic third person shooting gameplay with enhanced 3D platformer mechanics, fluid and fast movement is crucial to your success.

ORCS, VAMPIRES, DEMONS AND MORE
Mia’s team has been getting reports and rumors of bizarre and fearsome creatures roaming the islands. They include visions of dragons, giants and animals never seen before. Whatever’s there, its worth the risk for an Orc bounty.

STUNNING LANDSCAPES AND ENVIRONMENTS
The islands consist of lush jungle forests, desolate military bases and ancient ruins of an unknown civilization. Navigate your way through this the challenging and complex landscape to find the island’s hidden secrets. You will need to constantly scan your surroundings and work out how to gain access to structures and mysterious relics on the island.

GUNS – LOTS OF GUNS
You will have access to a large arsenal of specialized military hardware. Starting with a handgun and rife, you will need to search the island for additional weaponry that has been airdropped. Sub-machine guns, assault rifles, shotguns, sniper rifles, rocket launchers, grenades and more will all be at your disposal… if you can find them.

data.short_description: A classic action adventure shooter, featuring the bionic blonde bounty hunter Mia Zukov versus a horde of super Orcs and their army of the undead. Coming soon to Steam.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated HD Graphics Card
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8GB

content_descriptors.notes: As a 3D shooting game, it contains imagery and animations of human characters getting harmed and shot. Though not realistic violence (compared to movies), it would not be suitable for children or any other young person who has not played similar games. An equivalent movie rating would be PG13.
